name: WHIRL (snerg)
description:
Explore an ancient crater and meet its new inhabitants

Walking sim made for My First Game Jam Summer 2017. Enjoy and leave me some feedback! 

Background: 

Totally incomplete, and may require a monster graphics card to run appears to be optimized for performance somehow. I'm hoping to fix some issues and make some updates in the coming days.

Out of a two week jam, I managed to use five days constructively, so there isn't much interactivity at all. But I think I succeeded in making something that's atmospheric and looks good.

My goals were -

  • Create assets from scratch instead of using bought/premade assets
  • Build something more or less complete
  • Not fuck it up

I got the first point at least.

To Do / Upcoming updates
  • Original 3D assets for the ruins
  • Moving whirl - interactive nonsense
  • Better foliage
  • Story or something?!?
  • Shaders that don't suck
  • ....
